answers.answer: hi there, i am due october 3rd. i am having twins . at my ultrasound 2 weeks ago they weighed in at 4 pounds 6 ounces and 3 pounds 13 ounces. the doctor says they are big because i have gestational diabetes

Hi aziza,I am supposed to be having my baby in my arms the first of Oct. I also feel a little bit tired and in the mornings my body is very sore. Probably it's because I am with the nesting instinct (cleaning, scrubbing... you name it). On Monday I will be 34 weeks and pretty much anxious, nervous but VERY positive.Keep in touch!

Hello, I am also 32 weeks! I cant wait to meet this little man! I have been measuring 3 weeks ahead for the last 2 months so I hope on Monday my dr will do an US to make sure all is well with this little guy... Also I have been having extreme pain in my lower right back they said it was siatic nerve pain but its awful when I am trying to get in and out of bed some days it hurts to walk. But it is all worth it in the end! Take care ladies
does anyones hips hurt? my whole pelvis and hips is sore. sometimes it feels like my legs are going to come off. lol

Been a while since I posted!  I am due Oct 28th, but at this point, the doctor says she is worried about my baby girl being so big.  I am almost 30 weeks and the doc thinks she is already about 4 lbs.  At my next check up on the 27th she will decide whether or not to do another u/s and go from there.  If she gets too big, they will induce at 38 weeks she said.  Guess we'll see!  Other than that, things are fine.  She loves doing aerobics in there - definitely a mover and a shaker.  My lower back is KILLING me as well.  I see my chiropractor once a week now.  It has really helped, but even he can't alleviate all the pressure she is putting on me.  Also, I have developed this wonderful thing called a hemorrhoid.  She is low already and putting some major pressure on things the dr said and those are to be expected - JUST LOVELY!  Even with that, I have no complaints.  I am just so blessed and happy to be pregnant with a healthy baby!  Hope you all enjoy your 3rd trimester b/c it won't be long - we'll see our angels before you know it!

question: Hello October Mommies,How are you everybody ? How do you feel now? I am in 32 weeks. I have to wait 8 weeks more to see my little angel. Now a days, i feel back pain at nights and i've got tired quickly. I took ultrasound yesterday. My baby is good and gained 4 lb 5 oz. I think it is little big than normal. What about other october mommies?
title: Hello October Mommies
